findings.title: Application Allows Backup
findings.description: The app allows ADB backup which can expose application data including databases, shared preferences, and cached data.

findings.title: Cleartext Traffic Allowed
findings.description: The app allows unencrypted HTTP traffic. Sensitive data could be intercepted by attackers on the same network.
findings.attack_vector: MITM proxy to intercept HTTP traffic
findings.poc: Configure device proxy and intercept with mitmproxy/Burp
findings.remediation: Set android:usesCleartextTraffic='false' and implement Network Security Config

findings.title: Outdated Target SDK
findings.description: Target SDK  is outdated and may lack security features.
